header: Kevin Hart injured in car crash
content: Kevin Hart has suffered major back injuries in Southern California car crash. 40-year-old actor-comedian and the driver, Jared Black, were in a Plymouth Barracuda that went off Mulholland Highway and rolled down an embankment. Another passenger, Rebecca Broxterman, 31, did not suffer substantial injuries.
Hart bought the 1970 Plymouth Barracuda in July as a 40th birthday gift to himself.
